title: Episode #675 - Cowboys and Indians
description:
Comedians Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J. Gomez, and Dave Smith discuss their opinions on classic rock bands, Luis’ first mosh pit, rumors that John McAffe faked his own death, Luis’ review of William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet, Seth Rogan’s disassociation with James Franco, a woman viciously attacked by a fox, and KSI’s reaction to a racist song. All This and More, ONLY on The Most Offensive Podcast On Earth, The LEGION OF SKANKS!!! 

Air Date: 08/26/22

Support our sponsors!
